summary: A high school slacker commits a shocking act and proceeds to let his friends in on the secret. However, the friends' reaction is almost as ambiguous and perplexing as the crime itself.
cast: Crispin Glover|Keanu Reeves|Ione Skye|Daniel Roebuck|Dennis Hopper|Joshua John Miller|Roxana Zal|Josh Richman|Phillip Brock|Tom Bower|Constance Forslund|Leo Rossi|Jim Metzler|Tammy Smith|Danyi Deats|Yuzo Nishihara|Taylor Negron|Christopher Peters|Richard Richcreek|Maeve Odum|Francis De L'Etanche du Bois|Michael Hungerford|James Terry|Maryedith Burrell|Helen Kelly
title: Instinto s√°dico
